name: wonder-guard

effect.sun-moon: fire fang and moves that inflict typeless damage ignore this ability regardless of type.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: fire fang and moves that inflict typeless damage ignore this ability regardless of type.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: fire fang and moves that inflict typeless damage ignore this ability regardless of type.

short_effect: Protects against damaging moves that are not super effective.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.
